LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_GuardianPsyField_On.label: Weaver Psychic Field
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_GuardianPsyField_On.descr: The Weaver projects a powerful psychic defense field that automatically intercepts hostile projectiles entering its area of effect. Its shield strength is related to psychic sensitivity, making it hard to break, but each interception accumulates psychic entropy.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_GuardianPsyField_Off.desc: Disables the Weaver's psychic defense field.
